A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Worst! Worst Star Wars film ever. And one of the worst films ever. Story sacrificed to heavy-handedly introduce agendas and to set up visuals meant to trick non-thinking audience to like it. At least the prequels had a coherent story. This story made no sense and totally contradicts the previous film's setup. And now Lucasfilm getting bots to raise the rating of this travesty of a film. I'd give this a negative star if I could. IT WAS THAT BAD. Disney cancel Rian's new trilogy unless you really want to lose money.
